title: Volkswagen Virtus and Taigun get up to Rs 2 lakh off on MY2024 stock
description: The unsold MY2024 units of the Volkswagen Virtus and Taigun are available with huge discounts in April. Depending on the variant, customers can avail of a flat cash discount, an exchange bonus or a scrappage bonus, and a loyalty bonus. Volkswagen is offering attractive benefits on MY2025 units as well. The Volkswagen Tiguan, which had discounts worth over Rs 4 lakh last month, has been delisted from the brand's website to make way for the Tiguan R Line. Benefits on the Taigun and Virtus are unchanged in April Virtus price range goes from Rs 10.44 lakh-19 lakh Taigun price starts at Rs 11 lakh Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to the availability of stock. Check with your local dealer for exact figures. Volkswagen Virtus discounts April 2025 Save up to Rs 1.5 lakh For the MY2024 Virtus models, discounts go up to Rs 1.5 lakh, depending on the inventory. The MY2025 stock of the sedan gets benefits of up to Rs 70,000 at most Volkswagen showrooms. New prices for the Virtus start at Rs 10.44 lakh and go up to Rs 19 lakh. Volkswagen Taigun discounts April 2025 Save up to Rs 2 lakh Like March, benefits on the Taigun SUV continue to go up to Rs 2 lakh for MY2024 units, depending on inventory. These benefits include a cash discount, loyalty bonus, and other benefits like scrappage/ exchange bonus where applicable (depending on the variant). For the new MY2025 Taigun stock, the brand is offering benefits of up to Rs 1 lakh. Prices start at Rs 11 lakh for the entry-level Comfortline variant (1.0-litre TSI engine), going up to Rs 19.18 lakh for the top GT Plus (1.5-litre TSI engine) model.  ALL PRICES ARE EX-SHOWROOM, DELHI Also, see: Tata Curvv on discount for the first time Mahindra Thar, XUV700, Scorpio N discounted up to Rs 1.25 lakh
author: Uday Singh

html:
Volkswagen Taigun and Virtus get up to Rs 1 lakh in benefits on MY2025 stock.

The unsold MY2024 units of the Volkswagen Virtus and Taigun are available with huge discounts in April. Depending on the variant, customers can avail of a flat cash discount, an exchange bonus or a scrappage bonus, and a loyalty bonus. Volkswagen is offering attractive benefits on MY2025 units as well. The Volkswagen Tiguan, which had discounts worth over Rs 4 lakh last month, has been delisted from the brand's website to make way for the Tiguan R Line.

  1. Benefits on the Taigun and Virtus are unchanged in April
  2. Virtus price range goes from Rs 10.44 lakh-19 lakh
  3. Taigun price starts at Rs 11 lakh

Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to the availability of stock. Check with your local dealer for exact figures.

Volkswagen Virtus discounts April 2025

Save up to Rs 1.5 lakh

For the MY2024 Virtus models, discounts go up to Rs 1.5 lakh, depending on the inventory. The MY2025 stock of the sedan gets benefits of up to Rs 70,000 at most Volkswagen showrooms. New prices for the Virtus start at Rs 10.44 lakh and go up to Rs 19 lakh.

Volkswagen Taigun discounts April 2025

Save up to Rs 2 lakh

Like March, benefits on the Taigun SUV continue to go up to Rs 2 lakh for MY2024 units, depending on inventory. These benefits include a cash discount, loyalty bonus, and other benefits like scrappage/ exchange bonus where applicable (depending on the variant). For the new MY2025 Taigun stock, the brand is offering benefits of up to Rs 1 lakh. Prices start at Rs 11 lakh for the entry-level Comfortline variant (1.0-litre TSI engine), going up to Rs 19.18 lakh for the top GT Plus (1.5-litre TSI engine) model. 

ALL PRICES ARE EX-SHOWROOM, DELHI
